name.en: Special topic for interdisciplinary artificial intelligence
name.ch: 人工智慧跨域應用專題

goal.ch:
運用通識教育中心人工智慧跨域學分學程所開設之課程知識，以小組團隊分工合作模式，製作期末專題。讓同學可以將所學的程式語言應用在實際落地的專題應用上。從選題、數據收集、模型製作、簡報呈現、書面報告等，各有難度以及需克服的地方，考驗同學面對問題，解決問題的能力，並參與各項競賽。
表現出以下特質的同學，將可獲得較多分數：
1. 創意思考，挖掘問題
2. 嘗試以有效率的方式，獨立思考，解決問題
3. 利他主義，共好主義
執行步驟：
1. 分組成立AI團隊，針對某商業痛點或社會議題進行發想，提出包含AI技術的解決方案並實作概念驗證
2. AI團隊分工：資料科學家、資料工程師、資料分析師、專案經理 (每人身兼數職)
3. 產出成果：完整論述、AI模型或演算法、資料收集分析處理流程、人機互動介面、專題網站、專題簡報
4. 參加比賽：鼓勵參加合適的AI競賽
goal.en:
Utilizing the knowledge from courses offered by the General Education Center‘s interdisciplinary Artificial Intelligence Credit Program, students work in small teams to collaborate on a final project. This allows students to apply the programming languages they have learned to practical project applications. From topic selection, data collection, model creation, presentation design, to written reports, each step presents challenges and obstacles that test students‘ ability to face and solve problems, as well as participate in various competitions.

The following characteristics will earn students higher scores:

1. Creative thinking and problem exploration.
2. Attempting to independently think and solve problems in an efficient manner.
3. Altruism and a sense of working for the common good.


Execution steps:

1. Form AI teams and brainstorm ideas for a specific business pain point or social issue, proposing AI-based solutions and conducting conceptual validation.
2. AI team division of labor: data scientist, data engineer, data analyst, project manager (each member may assume multiple roles).
3. Deliverables: comprehensive descriptions, AI models or algorithms, data collection and analysis processes, human-machine interaction interfaces, project websites, and project presentations.
4. Participate in competitions: Encourage participation in suitable AI competitions.

outline.ch:
【選修此課程】
請於開課第一週星期三18:00到文學一館113教室拿密碼卡加選
【上課時間】
6月20日至6月30日(共9日)，每日授課6小時，0900-1200，1300-1600，實體Group Meeting，文一113教室。專題報告時間為7/21，0900-1200以線上會議進行。
【小組討論】
各小組選定每週的固定時間進行小組線上討論
【授課內容】
專題將以計畫導向(Project - orientated)的方式，讓學生運用相關的數學與程式針對自己感興趣的企業或社會痛點，使用人工智慧提出解方，並予以實作驗證，證明方法有效。
【課程要求】
1. 每天報告分為「研究報告」與「進度報告」
2. 「研究報告」輪流進行，每學期至少報告一次或以上，不同學生的報告次數可能不同，每次會得到報告分數
3. 「進度報告」每週每人報告，每次會得到報告分數
4. 期中考週進行各組30分鐘「專題提案報告」；期末考週進行各組30分鐘「專題期末報告」
5. 請假須依「學生請假規則」辦理，若因請假無法報告，需於一天內約時間補報告，否則不予計分
【修課規定】
學生依所屬院別，須修畢該院別於本學程所屬領域之 AI 程式語言、AI 基礎課程、AI 跨域應用及 AI 社會運用主軸課程，方可修習 AI 專題實作。
【分組】
1. 優先自行找組員，並進行專題題目發想
2. 組員請找有互補性的組員，以形成AI團隊：資料科學家、資料工程師、資料分析師、專案經理 (每人身兼數職)
3. 開課後尚未找到組員的同學，由老師指定分組
outline.en:
【Course Registration】
Please come to Room 113, Literature Building, on Wednesday at 18:00 during the first week of the course to collect the password card for enrollment.
【Class Schedule】
From June 20th to June 30th (9 days in total), classes will be held daily for 6 hours, from 09:00 to 12:00 and 13:00 to 16:00, in-person group meetings at Room 113, Literature Building. The project presentations will take place on July 21st from 09:00 to 12:00 in an online conference.
【Group Discussions】
Each group will select a fixed time each week for online group discussions.
【Course Content】
The project will be conducted in a project-oriented manner, where students will apply relevant mathematics and programming to address business or societal pain points of their interest using artificial intelligence. They will propose solutions and carry out practical validations to demonstrate their effectiveness.
【Course Requirements】
1. Daily reports will consist of “research reports“ and “progress reports“.
“Research reports“ will be conducted on a rotating basis, with each student presenting at least once or more per semester. The number of report presentations may vary among different students, and each presentation will receive a score.
2. “Progress reports“ will be given by each student on a weekly basis, and each report will receive a score.
3. During the midterm exam week, each group will present a 30-minute “project proposal report.“ During the final exam week, each group will present a 30-minute “final project report.“
4. Leave of absence must be in accordance with the “Student Leave Regulations.“ If unable to present due to a leave of absence, a make-up report should be arranged within one day. Otherwise, no score will be given.
【Course Regulations】
Students must complete the required AI programming language, AI foundation, AI interdisciplinary application, and AI social application courses in their respective colleges before taking the AI project implementation course.
【Group Formation】
Students are encouraged to form their own groups and brainstorm project topics.
Group members should find complementary teammates to form an AI team: data scientists, data engineers, data analysts, and project managers (each member may take on multiple roles).
Students who have not found group members after the course starts will be assigned groups by the teacher.
